# init(morphology:)

**Initializer**

Creates an inflection rule with the given morphology.

## Declaration

```swift
init(morphology: Morphology)
```

## Parameters

- **morphology**: The morphology this rule applies when inflecting.

## Creating an Inflection Rule from a Morphology

- **Morphology**: A description of the grammatical properties of a string.
